      • getEventMask

        protected int getEventMask()
        Description copied from class: SolverEventSource
        Return mask of flag bits that are used to determine whether to generate events. This is used by SolverEventSource.notifyListenerChanged() to clear the specified flag bits. It is assumed that the value of all zeros indicates that the object needs to recompute its flags based on the listener.

        The default implementation returns zero.

        Overriders should usually combine local value with value from super class using bitwise or, e.g.: 

            return ThisClass.EVENT_MASK | super.getEventMask();
        Overrides:
        getEventMask in class SolverEventSource

      • cloneMessage

        @Nullable
protected IParameterizedMessage cloneMessage(int edge)
        Returns a clone of outgoing message for given edge.

        Parameters:
        edge - index in the range [0, getSiblingCount()-1].
        Returns:
        clone of message if applicable. May return null if there is no message or if subclass does not support messages. In the latter case, supportsMessageEvents() should return false.

        The default implementation returns null.

        Subclasses that override this method to return a non-null message should also override supportsMessageEvents().

        Since:
        0.06

      • doUpdate

        protected void doUpdate()

      • doUpdateEdge

        protected abstract void doUpdateEdge(int edge)

      • createMessageEvent

        @Nullable
protected SolverEvent createMessageEvent(int edge,
                                      @Nullable
                                      IParameterizedMessage oldMessage,
                                      IParameterizedMessage newMessage)
        Creates a IMessageUpdateEvent event.

        Default implementation returns null. When this method returns null, then supportsMessageEvents() should also return false.

        Parameters:
        edge - is the outgoing edge for the messages.
        oldMessage - is the previous value of the message, which may be null.
        newMessage - is the new message value, which must not be null.
        Since:
        0.06

      • messageEventType

        @Nullable
protected java.lang.Class<? extends SolverEvent> messageEventType()
        If supportsMessageEvents(), this returns the base type for all message events that can be created by this object. Default implementation returns null.
        Since:
        0.06

      • supportsMessageEvents

        protected boolean supportsMessageEvents()
        Indicate subclass has a concept of passing a IParameterizedMessage messages.

        Should only return true if:

        • cloneMessage(int) can return non-null message
        • messageEventType() is non-null
        • createMessageEvent(int, com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.parameterizedMessages.IParameterizedMessage, com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.parameterizedMessages.IParameterizedMessage) can return a non-null event
        Since SVariableBase and SFactorBase implement the latter two methods, subclasses of those classes that support message events only need to implement cloneMessage(int) and this method.

        The default implementation returns false.

        Since:
        0.06
